Class Modifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • Modifier
  • public class Modifier
extends greenfoot.World
    This Modifier World allows the user to modify the features of the game (The soldiers chosen & the initial coin value)
    Version:
    April 28, 2022
    Author:
    Kevin Zhu, Benny Wu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Modifier​(TitlePage tp)
      This Constructor will initialize the background and button in the Modifier world

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()
      The act method for the modifier that keeps track of the user interactions (button clicks, coin updates, etc.)
      int clickAdd​(AddButton ab, int coin)
      This method will add 10 gold for that value
      int clickMinus​(MinusButton mb, int coin)
      This method will minus 10 gold for that value
      int getBCoin()
      This method will return the total number of coins the blue team has

      This method will return the state of the i-th blue switch

      This method will return the total number of coins the red team has

      This method will return the state of the i-th red switch
      java.util.Stack<java.lang.Integer> getTimeList()
      This method will return the timeList (the time that the user has entered)
      void input()
      This method is for user to input the time by keyboard

      This method will change the state of the specific soldier
      void returnTitlePage()
      This method will change the world to TitlePage world
      void typesSound()
      This method will play a sound effect when the user inputs the time
      void updateButton()
      This method will updating the status of the 8 buttons based on user interactions
      void updateCoin()
      This method will updating the value of the coins from both team

      • clickAdd

        public int clickAdd​(AddButton ab,
                    int coin)
        This method will add 10 gold for that value
        Parameters:
        ab - the AddButton to follow around
        coin - the int value to add the 10 gold to return the result after adding the coins

      • clickMinus

        public int clickMinus​(MinusButton mb,
                      int coin)
        This method will minus 10 gold for that value
        Parameters:
        mb - a reference to the minus button
        coin - the original value of the coin to be subtracted
        Returns:
        int the new coin value after subtracting

        public boolean onClick​(boolean state,
                       SoldierSwitchButton sb)
        This method will change the state of the specific soldier
